name: Michael V.
description:
'''Beethoven Del Valle Bunagan''' (born December 17, 1969), known professionally as '''Michael V'''. and nicknamed '''Bitoy''', is a Filipino actor, comedian, director, and musician whose discovery of his [[Impersonator|impersonation]] abilities launched his professional trajectory in the [[Entertainment|entertainment industry]]. He first demonstrated his performance skills in a rap competition on the variety program ''[[Eat Bulaga!]]'' in the late 1980s, where he did not secure a victory, but subsequently attained recognition through his [[Answer song|response]] comedy track "Maganda Ang Piliin", establishing his dual profile as a rapper and singer. His professional visibility expanded when he joined as an original cast member of the sketch comedy program ''[[Bubble Gang]]'' (1995–present) and subsequently led his own comedy productions, including ''[[Bitoy's Funniest Videos]]'' (2004–2009) and ''[[Hole in the Wall (Philippine game show)|Hole in the Wall]]'' (2009–2010), as well as the sitcom ''[[Pepito Manaloto]]'' (2010–present), in which he performed the lead role and assumed directorial responsibilities commencing in 2022.

In addition to his work in comedy, he achieved critical recognition for his original composition "Sinaktan Mo Ang Puso Ko" (1997), which received an [[Awit Awards]] in 1998. In 2017, he diversified into a digital content career on [[YouTube]] and accomplished his first directorial feature film debut in 2019 with the drama ''[[Family History (2019 film)|Family History]]'', in which he also performed the lead role.
